title: I’m a Trauma Nurse Struggling To Connect in My Marriage
description:
In today’s episode, we hear from a mom wondering whether she and her husband should tell their kids about his past sex addiction, a parent whose young son’s intense behavior issues are disrupting the family, and a young couple who’s overworked, burned out, and looking for reconnection.
  When do we tell our kids about my husband’s past sexual addiction?
 Our son has behavioral issues & it’s affecting our family vacation plans
 I’m a trauma nurse struggling to connect in my marriage
 Trauma Stewardship - Laura van Dernoot Lipsky & Connie Burk
 Lyrics of the Day: "Stop This Train" - John Mayer
